solutions.name: Medloop Integrated Covid-19 Vaccine Manager (ICVM)
solutions.summary: The ICVM is a COVID-19 vaccine appointment management solution that enables healthcare professionals to upload patient lists and invite patients (via SMS) to book their first and second vaccination appointment based on the default setting of the vaccine type. The solution also offers an intuitive calendar that has the ability to mark open time slots, book patients in and record any adverse reactions from the vaccination directly into the patient record.

vaccinations.title: How this Catalogue Solution can help with coronavirus vaccinations
list: This Catalogue Solution has been assessed for appointments management
Tracks availability of COVID-19 vaccination appointments
Allows bulk sending of vaccination appointment invites and reminders via SMS
Automatically sends appointment cancellation notifications via SMS
Enables patients to book and cancel their own vaccination appointments
This Catalogue Solution has met the Appointments Management - COVID-19 Vaccinations Capability

solutions.name: accuRx
solutions.summary: accuRx offers vaccine appointment management functionality via its accuBook Additional Service. accuBook allows the sending of vaccination invite communications, appointment notification, reminders, and the ability for patients to manage their own vaccination appointments.
